meanings.definition: The surgical removal of the spleen.
meanings.sent1: After the accident, the doctor recommended splenectomies to treat the internal bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed multiple splenectomies last month due to various medical conditions.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the spleen made a quick exit, waving goodbye to the body before the splenectomies.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the spleen felt like a weight lifted off, as if the splenectomies brought newfound freedom.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the sound of splenectomies, marking the end of an era for the patient.

meanings.sent1: In the medical report, it mentioned several splenectomies performed on different patients.

meanings.sent3: The nurse chuckled at the word 'splenectomies,' imagining a group of spleens having a party.
meanings.sent4: The classroom discussion on splenectomies sparked curiosity about the variety of cases in hospitals.
